post.summary: api for lotos to communicate with high winning system for claimed coupons
post.description: High winning system can request a find success or report a payment or request for a rollback(future use)

parameters.name: inputData
parameters.description: Data required for the Lotto Play transaction

description.description: Error message/additional details describing the error. LOtos may use this field to report additional info if available.

requestType.description: type of request.  0 = INQUIRE 1 = PAY BANK 2 = ROLLBACK (for future use) 3 = PAY PO

ticketId.description: TICKET ID that identifies ticket in Lotos. In lotos maps to barcode

paymentId.description: Unique identifier of Bank claimed. Generated by HWS. maximum value of 2^63-1

timestamp.description: Timestamp of  event which triggers validateWinner service. (e.g. HWS back office action when PAY PO is requested). Used by HWS to report in bank reconciliation files when ticket was paid by PO.

ticketStatus.description: Lotos sends ticket status and HWS compares against local status.

grossWinnings.description: Gross value of high winnings. In cents and EUR. Always positive.

netWinnings.description: Net value of high winnings. In cents and EUR. Always positive.

taxWithheld.description: Tax withheld from high winnings. In cents and EUR. Always positive.

refund.description: Any refunded amount in cents (on the Ticket level), currency is EUR.

gameIdList.description: Lottery: The gameIdList is filled with the amounts set in fields grossWinnings, netWinnings, taxWithheld.

grossWinnings.description: Gross value of high winnings. In cents and EUR. Always positive.

netWinnings.description: Net value of high winnings. In cents and EUR. Always positive.

refund.description: Any refunded amount in cents (on the Ticket level), currency is EUR.

Unique ID that should be generated by the provider

systemTime.description: System acceptance time in UTC (seconds from '1/1/1970')

commandPending.description: A flag that denotes if there is a pending message/command
